## hpr0612 :: Urban cyclist - Commuting

 Intro - I am guitarman in IRC, got the nick from a Jerry Reid song which Elvis borrowed - just liked the lyrics and the performance. Not a health Nut, Nor an Expert on bike repair but do cycle every day and have for over 2.5 years.
Complete show notes https://hackerpublicradio.org/shownotes/hpr0612.html
